an5.194:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava vesaliyam viharati mahavane kutagarasalayam.
an5.194:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena karanapali brahmano licchavinam kammantam kareti.
an5.194:1.3: Addasa kho karanapali brahmano pingiyanim brahmanam duratova agacchantam;
an5.194:2.1: “Handa kuto nu bhavam pingiyani agacchati diva divassa”ti?
an5.194:2.3: “Tam kim mannati bhavam pingiyani samanassa gotamassa pannaveyyattiyam? Pandito manne”ti?
an5.194:2.4: “Ko caham, bho, ko ca samanassa gotamassa pannaveyyattiyam janissami.
an5.194:2.5: Sopi nunassa tadisova yo samanassa gotamassa pannaveyyattiyam janeyya”ti.
an5.194:2.6: “Ularaya khalu bhavam pingiyani samanam gotamam pasamsaya pasamsati”ti.
an5.194:2.7: “Ko caham, bho, ko ca samanam gotamam pasamsissami.
an5.194:2.8: Pasatthappasatthova so bhavam gotamo settho devamanussanan”ti.
an5.194:2.9: “Kim pana bhavam pingiyani atthavasam sampassamano samane gotame evam abhippasanno”ti?
an5.194:3.1: “Seyyathapi, bho, puriso aggarasaparititto na annesam hinanam rasanam piheti;
an5.194:3.2: evamevam kho, bho, yato yato tassa bhoto gotamassa dhammam sunati—
an5.194:3.3: yadi suttaso, yadi geyyaso, yadi veyyakaranaso, yadi abbhutadhammaso—
an5.194:3.4: tato tato na annesam puthusamanabrahmanappavadanam piheti.
an5.194:4.1: Seyyathapi, bho, puriso jighacchadubbalyapareto madhupindikam adhigaccheyya.
an5.194:4.2: So yato yato sayetha, labhateva sadurasam asecanakam;
an5.194:4.3: evamevam kho, bho, yato yato tassa bhoto gotamassa dhammam sunati—
an5.194:4.4: yadi suttaso, yadi geyyaso, yadi veyyakaranaso, yadi abbhutadhammaso—
an5.194:4.5: tato tato labhateva attamanatam, labhati cetaso pasadam.
an5.194:5.4: yadi mulato, yadi majjhato, yadi aggato—
an5.194:5.6: evamevam kho, bho, yato yato tassa bhoto gotamassa dhammam sunati—
an5.194:5.7: yadi suttaso, yadi geyyaso, yadi veyyakaranaso, yadi abbhutadhammaso—
an5.194:5.8: tato tato adhigacchati pamojjam adhigacchati somanassam.
an5.194:6.1: Seyyathapi, bho, puriso abadhiko dukkhito balhagilano.
an5.194:6.2: Tassa kusalo bhisakko thanaso abadham nihareyya;
an5.194:6.3: evamevam kho, bho, yato yato tassa bhoto gotamassa dhammam sunati—
an5.194:6.4: yadi suttaso, yadi geyyaso, yadi veyyakaranaso, yadi abbhutadhammaso—
an5.194:7.1: Seyyathapi, bho, pokkharani acchodaka satodaka sitodaka setaka supatittha ramaniya.
an5.194:7.2: Atha puriso agaccheyya ghammabhitatto ghammapareto kilanto tasito pipasito.
an5.194:7.3: So tam pokkharanim ogahetva nhatva ca pivitva ca sabbadarathakilamathaparilaham patippassambheyya.
an5.194:7.4: Evamevam kho, bho, yato yato tassa bhoto gotamassa dhammam sunati—
an5.194:7.5: yadi suttaso, yadi geyyaso, yadi veyyakaranaso, yadi abbhutadhammaso—
an5.194:8.1: Evam vutte, karanapali brahmano utthayasana ekamsam uttarasangam karitva dakkhinam janumandalam pathaviyam nihantva yena bhagava tenanjalim panametva tikkhattum udanam udanesi:
an5.194:12.1: Abhikkantam, bho pingiyani, abhikkantam, bho pingiyani.
an5.194:12.2: Seyyathapi, bho pingiyani, nikkujjitam va ukkujjeyya paticchannam va vivareyya, mulhassa va maggam acikkheyya andhakare va telapajjotam dhareyya: ‘cakkhumanto rupani dakkhanti’ti; evamevam bhota pingiyanina anekapariyayena dhammo pakasito.
an5.194:12.3: Esaham, bho pingiyani, tam bhavantam gotamam saranam gacchami dhammanca bhikkhusanghanca.
an5.194:12.4: Upasakam mam bhavam pingiyani dharetu, ajjatagge panupetam saranam gatan”ti.
